channel.title: Community on GDquest
channel.description: Recent content in Community on GDquest

item.title: Vote for future free tutorials! 2016
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: 06-2016 update: Voting is over! You were more than 400 to vote on the series you want to see on GDquest. Here are the top 3 results: Overview of Godot 2 (249 votes) Painting rock and grass tiles for 2d games (141 votes) Human proportions, from reality to games (119 votes) Let your voice be heard Up until now, the tutorials have been a bit random on GDquest.
